overview:
Jim is the Co-founder & President at Votigo, Inc.

Jim is an award-winning Internet marketing executive with over 15 years of experience creating and marketing world-class websites, applications, and promotions. Since co-founding Votigo in mid 2006, Jim has helped several leading brands, including Ford, Starwood Hotels & Resorts, Sears, MTV, and Intel, as well as top-tier advertising agencies including Ogilvy, Crispin Porter + Bogusky, DraftFCB, and Arnold Worldwide develop and implement successful social media marketing solutions. He is responsible for strategic vision, sales and account management, marketing, and business development. Before founding Votigo, Jim spent over 6 years at United Online, Inc. where he was a key member of the executive staff helping take it from 1 million users to over 20 million. As Vice President of Interactive Design Jim directed a world-wide team of designers and developers and was responsible for helping to define the marketing and product strategy as well as the consumer experience for the majority of United Online’s products and brands including NetZero and Juno. Jim has spoken on social media panels at CES and Likeable Summit. He has also given guest lectures on social media marketing at UNC Chapel Hill, and CU Boulder. Jim holds his Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Colorado, Boulder.
